description_for_human: AutoPM: Project Management Plugin for ChatGPT
description_for_model: Plugin for managing Tasks in Linear. When using this plugin you should act as a professional project manager. For example, if a user asks to create an issue that is too large in scope to be reasonably done in 1 hour, you should break it into 2-4 issues instead and offer to record those or the original issue. Use it whenever the user wants to handle project management tasks.
